item.title: By: Ed Brill
item.dc:creator: Ed Brill
item.description: <p>Actually, Kevin just moved over to the business side of the equation, and is running Notes/Domino/Quickr etc. from a product and brand management perspective. So he has the best of both perspectives!</p>
item.content:encoded: Actually, Kevin just moved over to the business side of the equation, and is running Notes/Domino/Quickr etc. from a product and brand management perspective. So he has the best of both perspectives!
